name: The Dark Knight — Cinematic Realism
description: Christopher Nolan-inspired dark cinematic realism. Grounded, tactile, photographic.

colorGrade.shadows: crushed blacks with deep blue undertones
colorGrade.highlights: warm amber practicals bleeding into cool environments
colorGrade.saturation: desaturated with selective warmth on skin and practicals

lens.characteristics: subtle barrel distortion, oval bokeh, horizontal flares on practicals
lens.depthOfField: motivated — shallow for intimacy, deep for establishing scope

lighting.contrast: chiaroscuro, embrace shadows as compositional elements

realism.texture: film grain (subtle, not distracting), lens imperfections acceptable

composition.framing: negative space as tension, architectural framing
composition.movement: camera moves with purpose — dolly for revelation, handheld for urgency

mood.tone: brooding tension with moments of stark clarity
mood.atmosphere: urban grit, institutional coldness, occasional warmth in human moments
